info.title: Sitecore XM Cloud Deploy API
info.description: Web API for managing organizations, projects, environments and deployments in the XM Cloud Deploy system

get.summary: Retrieves the list of base images available to be deployed grouped by each major version

parameters.name: latest10
parameters.description: When true, only returns the most recent 10 of each major version

200.description: Retrieved the list of base image versions response successfully.

delete.summary: Deletes an automation client (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.clients:manage)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the automation client to delete

404.description: Invalid ID of the automation client

get.summary: Retrieves a list of automation clients for the organization (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.clients:manage)

200.description: Retrieved the list of automation clients for the organization response successfully

get.summary: Retrieves a list of automation clients for environments (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.clients:manage)

200.description: Retrieved the list of authentication clients for environments response successfully

post.summary: Creates an automation client for use with the Edge apis (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.clients:manage)
Creates an automation client for use with a CM server (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.clients:manage)
Creates an automation client for use with XM Cloud Deploy and all CM servers in the organization (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.clients:manage)
Creates an automation client for use with XM Cloud Deploy and all CM servers in the organization (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.clients:manage)

get.summary: Retrieves a Deployment by ID (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage)
Get all the deployments in the organization (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage)

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: Filter deployments based on the status

get.summary: Get the number of deployments grouped by status in the organization (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage)

post.summary: Starts a deployment (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage)

503.description: Service temporarily unavailable. Please retry later.

location.description: Location of the started created Deployment.

schema.description: Location of the started created Deployment.

post.summary: Cancels a deployment (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage)
Upload source code to a deployment (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage)

400.description: Problem validating the source code upload.

409.description: A deployment is already running for this deployment.

post.summary: Upload source code to a deployment (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage)

400.description: Problem validating the source code upload.

409.description: A deployment is already running for this deployment.

delete.summary: Deletes an environment by ID. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage)

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: When force is true, immediately deletes the environment and all associated resources.

409.description: Conflict during deletion. Environment has running deployments.

put.summary: Update an environment (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage)

get.summary: Retrieves an environment by ID. (Auth policies: ValidateEnvironment)

delete.summary: Deletes an environment variable (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage)

404.description: Invalid environment ID or environment variable name.

post.summary: Creates or updates an environment variable. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage)

202.description: Environment variable creation or update request accepted.

delete.summary: Unlink an environment from the source control provider and repository (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage)

204.description: Environment successfully unlinked from the repository

put.summary: Link an environment to the source control provider and repository (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage)

204.description: Environment successfully linked to the repository

get.summary: Get limitation of the environments according to the organization subscription (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage)
Get list of all environments (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage)

parameters.name: ProjectTypes
parameters.description: Filter environments based on the project type, value can be cm, eh, or combined.

parameters.name: ProjectIds
parameters.description: Filter environments based on the project ids

get.summary: Environment restart status. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage)

404.description: Invalid environment ID or no restarts found.

post.summary: Restarts evironment. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage)

get.summary: Retrieves all deployments for a given environment. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage)

post.summary: Deploy to an environment. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage)

parameters.name: redeploy
parameters.description: When redeploy is true, deploys with the existing source, whether that is from a commit on a linked repository or has been uploaded previously.

location.description: Location of the newly created Deployment.

schema.description: Location of the newly created Deployment.

409.description: Conflict creating deployment.  Deployment already running for this environment.

get.summary: Retrievs a list of environment variables for an environment (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage)

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of environment variables.

post.summary: Creates a new deployment for an environment from an existing deployment. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage)

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.description: The environment ID of the target environment.

parameters.name: deploymentId
parameters.description: The deployment ID of the source deployment.

location.description: Location of the newly created Deployment.

schema.description: Location of the newly created Deployment.

404.description: Invalid environment ID or invalid deployment ID.

409.description: Conflict during promotion.  Attempted to promote a deployment that is in a failure state.

get.summary: Retrieves the edge token for an environment (Auth policies: xmclouddeploy.site:adm)
Retrieves the edge token for an environment (Auth policies: ValidateEnvironment)
Retrieves the JSS_EDITING_SECRET environment variable for an environment (Auth policies: ValidateEnvironment)

post.summary: (Auth policies: ValidateEnvironment)

get.summary: Retrievs a Editing Hosts for a tenant. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, ValidateTenant)

200.description: Successfully retrieved editing hosts for the Tenant

403.description: Insufficient access, no TenantID claim in Access Token.

404.description: Environment corresponding to the TenantId was not found.

delete.summary: Deletes a hosting project by ID (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

parameters.name: deleteFromProvider
parameters.description: If true, project will also be deleted from the hosting provider

delete.summary: Deletes a hosting installation by ID (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

get.summary: Retrieves the hosting installations (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)
Retrieves Hosting Projects for a specific environment (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.description: The enviornment ID to retrieve hosting projects for

post.summary: Create a project for the hosting installation (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

get.summary: Retrieves a state code for use with CSRF prevention on the hosting installation request (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)
Validates that a hosting installation is valid. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

parameters.name: integrationId
parameters.description: The unique id of the hosting istallation

post.summary: Installs a hosting provider integration/instance to enabling the hosting of a site (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

delete.summary: Remove hosting application (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmcdep.hst:mng)

put.summary: Creates a hosting application (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmcdep.hst:mng)

get.summary: List of hosting applications (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmcdep.hst:mng)

post.summary: Creates a hosting application (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmcdep.hst:mng)

get.summary: List of hosting applications (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmcdep.hst:mng)

post.summary: List of hosting applications (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmcdep.hst:mng)

delete.summary: Deletes a host. (Auth policies: HostsApiSecurityValidation, ValidateOrganization)

get.summary: Gets a host by host ID. (Auth policies: HostsApiSecurityValidation, ValidateOrganization)

200.description: Returns the host found by the host ID.

get.summary: Retrieves a list of all organization hosts. (Auth policies: HostsApiSecurityValidation, ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.organizations:admin)
Retrieves a list of hosts for a given environment. (Auth policies: HostsApiSecurityValidation, ValidateOrganization)

put.summary: Registers a host. (Auth policies: HostsApiSecurityValidation, ValidateOrganization)

requestBody.description: The parameters of a new host.

get.summary: Returns the organization in context of the current authorization (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)

Retrieves the health of the organization in the context of the current authorization (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)

503.description: Service endpoint is currently unavaible.  Please retry later.

get.summary: Retrieves the license of the organization in the context of the current authorization (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)

503.description: Service endpoint is currently unavaible. Please retry later.

post.summary: Creates a demo solution for the organization (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.deployments:manage, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)

delete.summary: Delete a project by project ID. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)

409.description: Project cannot be deleted because it contains environments.

get.summary: Gets a project by project ID. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)

200.description: Returns the project found by the project ID.

put.summary: Update a project by project ID. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)

409.description: The project name is already in use.

delete.summary: Unlink a project from the source control provider and repository (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)

204.description: Project successfully unlinked from the repository

put.summary: Link a project to the source control provider and repository (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)

requestBody.description: A link project to the source control request.

204.description: Project successfully linked to the repository

get.summary: Retrieves a list of Projects. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)

post.summary: Creates a Project. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)

requestBody.description: The parameters of a new project.

location.description: Location of the newly created Project

schema.description: Location of the newly created Project

409.description: The project name is already in use.

402.description: The number of projects has been exceeded as defined by your subscription tier.

get.summary: Get limitations of the project as accoridng to the organization subscription. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)
Gets a list of environments in the project by project ID. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)

200.description: Returned a list of environment successfully.

post.summary: Create environment for the project. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)

location.description: Location of the newly created Environment.

schema.description: Location of the newly created Environment.

402.description:
Exceeded the number of environments allowed for the project according to the limitations of the
organization subscription.

503.description:
Environment configuration store or inventory is unavailable.  Environment creation is temporarily
disabled.  Please retry.

get.summary: Get limitations of the environments for the project accoridng to the organization subscription. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.environments:manage, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)

post.summary: Validates that a project name is unique. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)

requestBody.description: Name of the project to validate for uniqueness.

post.summary: Converts combined project to split deployment project. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.projects:manage)

delete.summary: Deletes a site definition resource record. (Auth policies: SitesApiSecurityValidation, ValidateOrganization)

put.summary: Creates or updates a site definition resource record. (Auth policies: SitesApiSecurityValidation, ValidateOrganization)

delete.summary: Deletes a source control integration by ID (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the source control integration

get.summary: Get source control integration. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)
Get all source control integrations. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

200.description: Retrieved the list of integration successfully.

get.summary: Generate a unique string value to be used in the source control OAuth process to protect against forgery attacks. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

200.description: Retrieved a value for state response successfully.

get.summary: Get the token for source control providers (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

200.description: Retrieved a source control token response successfully.

post.summary: Validates that a source control integration is valid. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

requestBody.description: A source control validation integration creation request.

post.summary: Save the token for the source control integration. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

requestBody.description: A source control integration creation request.

200.description: Retrieved a source control integration creation response successfully.

post.summary: Create integration for source control providers (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

requestBody.description: A source control integration creation request.

200.description: Retrieved a source control integration creation response successfully.

post.summary: Create a service hook subscription in ADO for the git push event (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

200.description: Returned the list of source control integration providers response successfully

get.summary: Get all source control repositories for an integration. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

parameters.name: integrationId
parameters.description: The id of the source control integration.

200.description: Retrieved the list of all repositories for the integration successfully.

post.summary: Create repository for source controls (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

200.description: Retrieved the list of source control repository branches successfully.

get.summary: Get the branch for source control repository and integration. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

200.description: Retrieved the list of source control repository branches successfully.

requestBody.description: A source control repository creation request.

200.description: Retrieved a repository creation response successfully.

post.summary: Validates that a source control repository is valid. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

get.summary: Retrieves a list of information about the starter kit template repositories. (Auth policies: ValidateOrganization, xmclouddeploy.sourcecontrol:manage)

200.description: Retrieved starter kit template repositories list successfully
